# load {.tabset}

```{r, echo=FALSE,results = "asis"}
rm(list = ls())
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(modelsummary) # for N in datasummary

results_MPEC_1 <-
  readr::read_csv(file = here::here("results/results_MPEC_1.csv"),
                  col_names = FALSE)
true_param <-
  c(
    1.0,
    0.7,
    0.5,
    0.3,
    -3.0
  )
colnames(results_MPEC_1) <-
  c(
    "beta1",
    "beta2",
    "beta3",
    "beta4",
    "logc",
    "loglik",
    "time",
    "converged"
    )



```


## MPEC {.tabset}

### All

```{r,echo=FALSE,results = "asis"}
modelsummary::datasummary_skim(
  data = results_MPEC_1,
  "numeric"
  )
```

### Locally solved

```{r,echo=FALSE,results = "asis"}
modelsummary::datasummary_skim(
  data = results_MPEC_1 %>% 
    dplyr::filter(converged == "LOCALLY_SOLVED"),
  "numeric"
  )
```
